name: Perth Kalgasky
description:
Perth Kalgasky About

It is a top-down shooter, you are a robot, and you need to kill as many enemies as possible within the time limit! 

Made for the Wowie Jam 3.0 in three day! 
Topic: 
Failure is Progress 
Let's mess with the concepts of winning and losing.

Ps. There is a hidden mechanic/ an easter egg in the game based on the Jam Topic! 

If necessary/ you didn't find it, you could read what this mechanic is under "Hint".

Controls
  • Rotate = Left arrow/Right arrow
  • Shoot = Space
  • Go Back to Menu = Escape
Made by

Programming & Design

Abo Cado: abocado - itch.io

MS ANNOTATION X: MS ANNOTATION X - itch.io

Music

Patrick Patrikios: Patrick Patrikios - YouTube
